column2:
"Far too many ARKS ops neglect to make use of
vidphones. We can't encourage that kind of Luddite
behavior, if you ask me."

"Vidphones are so useful, whether you want to
chat with friends, buy and sell things, and so on.
And if you don't have friends yet, go make some!"

"So what about you? You should go try using a
vidphone while we're on the subject. Do it."

"Do what? Go use a vidphone!
Haven't you been listening?
You'd best pay attention."

"Well, what are you waiting for? It's not rocket
science. Now go put my mind at ease, all right?"

"昨今のアークスは、ビジフォンの利用を
おろそかにする者が多すぎる！
たるんでいると言わざるを得ん！"

"友との交流、物品の売買
用途は多岐に渡るのだぞ！
友がいない者は……まあ、がんばれ！"

"ええい、話している内にも
不安が鎌首をもたげてきた！
君、今すぐやってくるといい！"

"何を、って、決まっているだろう。
ビジフォンへのアクセスだ！"

"さあ、さあ、やってきてくれ！
そう難しいことではないはずだ！
私の不安を払拭してくれ！"
